Title: Gems of Power
Description:
You have found a gem that improves your combat capabilities when socketed into a prismatic socket found in your chest or leg armor.

Socket this Chipped Deadly Sapphire into your equipment to increase your Critical Strike chance.
ObjectivesText: [Shift Right Click your chest or leg armor and socket the Chipped Deadly Sapphire.]

Objectives.Text: Shift Right Click your armor and socket Chipped Deadly Sapphire
